transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Yes. Hello.
Executive: Hello. Ji sir mai Akonji Akonji Private Limited se baat kar raha hu.
Executive: Ji ji sir good morning Ayush baat kar raha hu India Mart se.
Customer: Sir kya hua isko sir abhi tak kuch hua hi nahi.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir aaj actually off rehta hai na to aaj aapka pura update profile hoke Monday aapka live kara diya jayega. Maine aapko bataya tha sir kal bhi.
Customer: Sir 100% aapke call aa jayegi live ho jayega.
Customer: Sir confirm matlab in the sense isme kuch yaha system pe live ho jayega nahi hoga.
Executive: Nahi bina aapke sir baat kare live nahi hoga na ye bhi hai.
Customer: Yaar mujhe parso se keh rahe ho sir aapke pass call aayegi live ho jayega call aayegi live ho jayega.
Executive: Sir sir actually mai aapki baat bilkul sahi hai usme aap bologe to aap ek bar maine aapse us din bhi kaha tha ki ek bar video mid pe aa jao maine unko aapka mail bhi forward kar diya tha unhone bola ki copy images ho rakhi hai in do teen sab usme.
Customer: Tabhi to maine aapse kaha tha ki mujhe photos de do mai update karke wo cheeze karwa do.
Executive: Sare photos hai itne photos bhej rakhe hai 200 300 photos hai.
Customer: Wo sara sir abhi profile aapki update karne baith raha hu mai sir aapka sara kara ke monday mujhe karane hi hai sir ye live.
Executive: Aur sir ek cheez aur mai bata deta hu jis din se aapki service live hoga recorded line pe hi hai hai na us din se aapki date calculate hoti hai.
Customer: Kis date se?
Executive: Jis din se aapki service live hoga ha jis din live hogi service waha se aapki validity count hogi aisa nahi aapne payment us din kar diya to waha se aapko service chal raha hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: Hai na sir? Sir aap karwao ise jaldi se.
Customer: Sir aapse jyada mujhe wo cheez hai bilkul 100%.
Executive: Abhi Ashwini aapko call karenge monday ko unse pehle mai hi kar lunga jo bhi cheeze aur rahenge usme kal kar monday ko kara ke pura complete kar deta hu.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Hai na sir? Okay.
Customer: Okay okay. Ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's profile is not yet live.

- Wants to know when the profile will be live.

- Wants the profile to be live soon.



Resolution:

- Executive informed profile will be live on Monday.

- Executive will update the profile.

- Validity will be counted from the live date.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- profile, live, validity, update
